title: (x) Salsa Font? - similar to Pious Henry, Carumba {Mike Y}
content:
Hi can anyone help me identify what font 'Salsa' is in the flyer? I know its been customized but I need something with similar characters? Similar alternatives would also be appreciated!

Thanks Guys

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121107002232im_/http:/typophile.com/files/200803_salsa_fridays_4200.JPG.jpeg)
author: simundo

comments.content:
I searched in Part 14 (Distressed Scripts) of the Script Guide and found a few candidates for similar fonts to start with: [Pious Henry](http://web.archive.org/web/20121107002232/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/pious+henry/fonts/) is one, and [Carumba](http://web.archive.org/web/20121107002232/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/carumba/) is another. There were lots of possibilities, but I didn't see this exact font. It's hard to know how much massaging it got to end up like your sample.

- Mike Yanega
